text: dhilik aldhy sharae lakum tilk al'ahkam aleadilat hu alhuq, wahu alqadir ealaa ma yasha'u, wmin qudratih 'anah yadkhul ma yunqas min saeat allayl fi saeat alnahari, wayadkhul ma antaqas min saeat alnahar fi saeat allayli, wa'ana allah samie likuli sutan, basir bikulin faeala, la yakhfaa ealayh shaya'a
